name: Ext_R3_Immunization_notGiven
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Immunization.notGiven for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Immunization.notGiven from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Immunization|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Flag for whether immunization was given
element.definition: Indicates if the vaccination was or was not given.
element.comment: `Immunization.extension` maps to R5 `Immunization.extension`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `Immunization.status` maps to R5 `Immunization.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `Immunization.statusReason` maps to R5 `Immunization.statusReason`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element Immunization.notGiven is flagged IsModifier

element.short: Flag for whether immunization was given
element.definition: Indicates if the vaccination was or was not given.
element.comment: `Immunization.extension` maps to R5 `Immunization.extension`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `Immunization.status` maps to R5 `Immunization.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `Immunization.statusReason` maps to R5 `Immunization.statusReason`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
